problem_text:
Find all local formations F of finite groups such that every finite minimal non-F-group is either a Shmidt group (that is, a non-nilpotent finite group all of whose proper subgroups are nilpotent) or a group of prime order.
L. A. Shemetkov
answer: They are found (S. F. Kamornikov, Siberian Math. J., 35, no. 4 (1994), 713–721).
